remarks: If a clopen set meets a connected subspace, it must contain the entire subspace.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Mar-2015.)
statement:
consubclo.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
consubclo.3 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ X ) $.
consubclo.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( J |`t A ) e. Con ) $.
consubclo.5 $e |- ( ph -> B e. J ) $.
consubclo.6 $e |- ( ph -> ( B i^i A ) =/= (/) ) $.
consubclo.7 $e |- ( ph -> B e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) $.
consubclo $p |- ( ph -> A C_ B ) $.
